# cbcTools <a href='https://jhelvy.github.io/cbcTools/'><img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" style="height:139px;"/></a>

This package provides a set of tools for designing surveys and conducting power analyses for choice-based conjoint survey experiments in R. Each function in the package begins with `cbc_` and supports a step in the following process for designing and analyzing surveys:

![](man/figures/program_diagram.png)

## Basic Usage

View the [basic usage](https://jhelvy.github.io/cbcTools/articles/basic_usage.html) page for details on how to use **cbcTools** to design choice-based conjoint experiments.

# Installation

The current version is not yet on CRAN, but you can install it from
Github using the {remotes} library:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jhelvy/cbcTools")
```

Load the library with:

```{r}
library(cbcTools)
```
